Merge pull request #111 from jaraco/module-invoke

Allow package to be invoked as `python -m bumpversion`
Include tests in pypi tarball, fixes #108

Merge pull request #112 from coredumperror/doc-fix

Removed quotes from documented default values of config settings.
Removed quotes from documentated default values of config settings.

Allow package to be invoked as `python -m bumpversion`

PEP 338 defines a spec allowing modules and packages to be executed without an entry script. This simple module makes `python -m bumpversion` execute bumpversion.

ConfiguredVersionPartConfiguration, NumericVersionPartConfiguration and VersionPart moved to a dedicated file.
Numeric and values bumping algorithms moved to a dedicated file with NumericEngine and ValuesEngine classes.
Added tests for all classes.
Added hints on --list advanced usage

Merge pull request #99 from lgiordani/cli-tests

CLI tests moved to tests directory
CLI tests moved to tests directory

Merge pull request #90 from lgiordani/feature/fix_travis

Fixed Travis CI

Added HOME to the list of environment variables passed by Tox to the test environment (see https://testrun.org/tox/latest/example/basic.html#passing-down-environment-variables). This is mandatory because Git wants to access the variables in ~/.gitconfig
